name: Maglam Lord
overview: Maglam Lord is an RPG for the Nintendo Switch, released on March 18, 2021 by D3Publisher. It was written by Summon Night series writer Kei Miyakozuki and follows Killrizark, a demon lord who has lost their power. Players can choose to play as the male or female version of Killrizark and embark on an adventure to forge magic swords, accompanied by their servant Satius. The game features a relationship system as Killrizark looks to find their soul mate to fix their “Soul Craving”.
